languages.text: {n}Взгляд Джиневри полон сочувствия — Кляйн ей явно симпатичен, но она не роняет честь товарища словами сочувствия. Хротко взирает на Кляйна с высокомерной ухмылкой, тот отвечает мрачным оскалом.{/n}

{n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Джиневри полон сочувствия — Кляйн ей явно симпатичен, но она не роняет честь товарища словами сочувствия. Хротко взирает на Кляйна с высокомерной ухмылкой, тот отвечает мрачным оскалом.{/n}

{n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri regarde Klein d'un air compatissant. De toute évidence, elle l'apprécie, mais elle ne souhaite pas attenter à son honneur par des paroles de réconfort. Quant à Hrotko, il observe son vis-à-vis avec un rictus méprisant tandis que Klein le fusille du regard en retour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevra regarde Klein d'un air compatissant. De toute évidence, elle l'apprécie, mais elle ne souhaite pas attenter à son honneur par des paroles de réconfort. Quant à Hrotko, il observe son vis-à-vis avec un rictus méprisant tandis que Klein le fusille du regard en retour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri observa a Klein con simpatía: es evidente que se preocupa por él, pero no quiere mancillar el honor de su camarada con palabras reconfortantes. Hrotko dedica una sonrisa burlona a Klein, y el anciano le lanza una mirada hostil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevra observa a Klein con simpatía: es evidente que se preocupa por él, pero no quiere mancillar el honor de su camarada con palabras reconfortantes. Hrotko dedica una sonrisa burlona a Klein, y el anciano le lanza una mirada hostil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}杰尼娃同情地看着克莱因。很显然，她很关心他，但又不想用安慰的话来践踏他的荣誉感。赫洛卡带着轻蔑的笑意看着克莱因，而克莱因也对赫洛卡怒目而视。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}杰尼娃同情地看着克莱因。很显然，她很关心他，但又不想用安慰的话来践踏同伴的荣誉感。赫洛卡带着轻蔑的笑意看着克莱因，而克莱因也对赫洛卡怒目而视。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジネヴリはクラインを同情のまなざしで見ている。彼女は明らかにクラインを気にかけているが、慰めの言葉で仲間の名誉を踏みにじろうとはしない。フロトコは軽蔑的な笑みをクラインに浮かべると、クラインはにらみ返した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジネブラはクラインを同情のまなざしで見ている。彼女は明らかにクラインを気にかけているが、慰めの言葉で仲間の名誉を踏みにじろうとはしない。フロトコは軽蔑的な笑みをクラインに浮かべると、クラインはにらみ返した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri blickt Klein voller Mitgefühl an. Er ist ihr offenbar wichtig, sie möchte jedoch nicht durch tröstende Worte auf der Ehre ihres Kameraden herumtrampeln. Hrotko betrachtet Klein mit einem verächtlichen Grinsen. Klein starrt grimmig zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevra blickt Klein voller Mitgefühl an. Er ist ihr offenbar wichtig, sie möchte jedoch nicht durch tröstende Worte auf der Ehre ihres Kameraden herumtrampeln. Hrotko betrachtet Klein mit einem verächtlichen Grinsen. Klein starrt grimmig zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri, Klein'a sempatiyle bakıyor. Onu önemsediği aşikâr. Ancak rahatlatıcı sözler söyleyerek yoldaşının onurunu ayaklar altına almak istemiyor. Hrotko Klein'a kibirli bir sırıtışla bakarken Klein, kaşlarını çatarak karşılık veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri looks at Klein with sympathy — she clearly cares about him, but does not wish to trample on her comrade's honour with words of comfort. Hrotko regards Klein with a contemptuous smirk, while Klein scowls back at him.{/n}
